columns.name: VALUE_TYPE
columns.description: Type of current value:  CURRENT = most recent accumulated value COUNT = # of accumulated values in the last hour AVERAGE = average of accumulated values in the last hour MAX = maximum of accumulated values in the last hour.

columns.name: THRESHOLD_VALUE
columns.description: If HIST_COMPARISON_GID is null, the value that has to be exceeded for the alert to trigger. Otherwise, a multiplier on the historical comparison statistic to trigger the alert.

columns.name: HIST_COMPARISON_GID
columns.description: If the THRESHOLD_VALUE is a multiplier on historical data (e.g. 150% of the average over the last three weeks), this holds the definition of the historical data comparison.

columns.name: COMPARISON_MISSING_AS_ZEROS
columns.description: If set to 'Y', any historical averages should view missing values as zeros. Otherwise, averages will be skewed only to periods with activity.

columns.name: COMPARISON_MIN_VALUE
columns.description: When comparing the current metric to a percentage of a historical measure, this is the minimum value of the historical measure to trigger the threshold. This avoids sensitivity to initial buildup of historical data or quiet periods of no activity.

columns.name: MIN_SEQUENTIAL_COUNT
columns.description: Minimum # of sequential alerts required to generate a notification.

columns.name: MIN_HOUR_COUNT
columns.description: Minimum # of alerts per hour to generate a notification.

columns.name: MIN_DURATION_BETWEEN
columns.description: Minimum duration, in seconds, between notifications.

columns.name: QUEUE_INTERVAL
columns.description: Current alerts are always queued and consolidated for notification in regular intervals to reduce overhead and avoid constant notifications. The queue interval is based on a reserved property and defaults to 5 minutes. Customers can use make the interval longer, if needed.

columns.name: IS_RESERVED
columns.description: If ''Y'', the record is reserved for use with OTM staged thresholds. It cannot be edited or removed by a user.
